subject: URGENT: Your account has been compromised
body:
URGENT SECURITY ALERT

Dear HairTech Customer,

We have detected unusual activity on your account. Your warranty registration is at risk!

Click the link below to verify your account immediately:
http://fakehairtech-verify.scam/login

You must act within 24 hours or your warranty will be CANCELLED.

Enter your:
- Full name
- Address
- Credit card number
- Social Security Number

HairTech Security Team
